function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited press freedom and threat of jail time for reporting on the virus","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strict measures and lockdown may have been eased too early","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"State of emergency and unlimited power to rule by decree","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contested measures in the use of esm and austerity measures evoke memories of the punitive regime forced on greece during the eurozone crisis.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consolidation of authoritarian powers under president viktor orbán and the ruling fidesz party in hungary due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unequal economic responses to covid-19 crisis between prosperous and poorer eu member states.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Controversy over the use of corona bonds and the european stability mechanism esm to finance recoveries.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fraught and contested use of the european stability mechanism esm for financing emergency health costs.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inhibition of centralised control of medical countermeasures by member states’ insistence on separating health law and eu internal market law.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relative weakness of the ecdc compared to international counterparts , cdc and discrepancies between member state responses to covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retreat to national self-interest in a time of crisis leading to discrepancies in member state responses to covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between public health authorities and governments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delay in equipment sharing and resource allocation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unplanned emergency response and lack of preparedness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited eu health mandate hindered public health responses to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global epicentre of the pandemic shifting to europe","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slow and haphazard initial reaction by the eu","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited mandate on public health for the eu","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Political and economic debates about financial recovery instruments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Member states’ political opportunism complicating response to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hesitation that the execution of the european green deal egd may fail or not meet the scale of the climate challenge","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Political challenges to the implementation of the egd, including opt-outs by member states and tight timelines for introducing the climate law","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Polarized opinion on the egd even before the onset of the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious diseases may spread through imported products and services","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public funding for egd initiatives may not prioritize health and safety measures to prevent disease transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate investment in green initiatives may lead to environmental conditions that increase disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global carbon emissions reduction targets not met","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to integrate existing environmental policies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of support for carbon-dependent member states in transitioning to renewable energy","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic transcends borders","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stalled progress on major measures announced in the european green deal egd","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for greater integration and stronger eu-level institutions for covid-19 response","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruption in the supply chain due to movement control and lockdown","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Loss of finance due to running cost and wages while project jobs are halted","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction on labor affecting productivity and work progress","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contractors suffering a loss of income due to payment suspension during mco","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decline in national economy leads to reduced job opportunities for contractors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Labor shortage and delay in materials supply due to covid-19 impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 impacting the construction industry globally","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Suspension and reduction of construction projects leading to loss of income for contractors","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disruptions in the supply chain and labor shortage affecting contractor productivity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High and frequent fluctuations in the overall economy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic decline due to pandemic impact","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of clear sop for workforce management","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seriousness of the covid-19 outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slowdown or stoppage of developments due to financial constraints","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High level of debt and low cash reserves for construction companies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Labor shortage and material supply chain disruptions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contractual ambiguity regarding contractors’ entitlements during a virus outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Financial impact on contractors due to delay in projects and economic instability","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
